paper_abstract: The median (antimedian) set of a profile p = (u(1), ... , u(k)) of vertices of a graph G is the set of vertices x that minimize (maximize) the remoteness Sigma(i) d(x, u(i)). Two algorithms for median graphs G of complexity O(n idim(G)) are designed, where n is the order and idim(G) the isometric dimension of G. The first algorithm computes median sets of profiles and will be in practice often faster than the other algorithm which in addition computes antimedian sets and remoteness functions and works in all partial cubes.
paper_title: Computing median and antimedian sets in median graphs
